resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Intermodal Potential Containers To Deliver Dataverse Pipeline')]

dependsOn.activity: Export IntermodelPotential Data From Dataverse to Blob

activities.name: Intermodelpotential Data From ADX To Staging Blob
Export IntermodelPotential Data From Dataverse to Blob

dependsOn.activity: Intermodelpotential Data From ADX To Staging Blob
Export PotentialContainer Data From Dataverse to Blob

activities.name: Export PotentialContainer Data From Dataverse to Blob

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_countrycode as string,
		maersk_countryid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['country/*.parquet']) ~> countrydatafromblob
source(output(
		maersk_siteid as string,
		maersk_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['sitecsp/*.parquet']) ~> sitedatafromblob
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['intermodalpotentialcontainerstodeliver']) ~> StagingBlobIntermodelPotentialContainerDataToDeliver
source(output(
		createdby as string,
		createdbyname as string,
		createdbyyominame as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		createdonbehalfby as string,
		createdonbehalfbyname as string,
		createdonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		importsequencenumber as integer,
		maersk_action as string,
		maersk_allocationdate as timestamp,
		maersk_bookingnumber as string,
		maersk_breakevenpricealtpool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_breakevenpricepool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_caseid as string,
		maersk_consigneename as string,
		maersk_consigneescvcode as string,
		maersk_countryofportentry as string,
		maersk_countryofportentryname as string,
		maersk_datahash as string,
		maersk_destinationlocationid as string,
		maersk_destinationlocationname as string,
		maersk_diplalocation as string,
		maersk_diplalocationname as string,
		maersk_dispatcherapmid as string,
		maersk_disposeddateonfirmedbycustomer as timestamp,
		maersk_dropnumber as string,
		maersk_equipmentgroup as string,
		maersk_estimatedstatusofdelivery as string,
		maersk_evaccostaltpool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_evaccostpool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_expectedcontainersaleslocationid as string,
		maersk_intermodalcontainerid as string,
		maersk_lastmothervesselarrivaltime as timestamp,
		maersk_lastraildestination as string,
		maersk_lastraildestinationname as string,
		maersk_move as string,
		maersk_movelocationid as string,
		maersk_movelocationidname as string,
		maersk_movetimestamp as timestamp,
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_portentrycountry as string,
		maersk_productionyear as string,
		maersk_region as string,
		maersk_returnclientaddress as string,
		maersk_returnclientemail as string,
		maersk_returnclientname as string,
		maersk_standardcomment as string,
		maersk_type as string,
		maersk_weekloc as string,
		maersk_wonumber as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		modifiedbyname as string,
		modifiedbyyominame as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		modifiedonbehalfby as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyname as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		overriddencreatedon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		owneridname as string,
		owneridtype as string,
		owneridyominame as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		owningteam as string,
		owninguser as string,
		statecode as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as integer,
		utcconversiontimezonecode as integer,
		versionnumber as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['intermodalpotentialcontainerstodeliver']) ~> dataversedata
StagingBlobIntermodelPotentialContainerDataToDeliver derive(container_id = trim(toString(byName('container_id'))),
		allocation_date = toTimestamp(toString(byName('allocation_date'))),
		dipla_location_id = trim(toString(byName('dipla_location_id'))),
		dipla_location_name = trim(toString(byName('dipla_location_name'))),
		booking_number = trim(toString(byName('booking_number'))),
		drop_number = trim(toString(byName('drop_number'))),
		destination_location_id = trim(toString(byName('destination_location_id'))),
		destination_location_name = trim(toString(byName('destination_location_name'))),
		consignee_name = trim(toString(byName('consignee_name'))),
		region = trim(toString(byName('region'))),
		last_rail_dest = trim(toString(byName('last_rail_dest'))),
		return_client_name = trim(toString(byName('return_client_name'))),
		return_client_address = trim(toString(byName('return_client_address'))),
		return_client_email = trim(toString(byName('return_client_email'))),
		production_year = toInteger(byName('production_year')),
		equipment_group = trim(toString(byName('equipment_group'))),
		consignee_scv_code = trim(toString(byName('consignee_scv_code'))),
		type = trim(toString(byName('type'))),
		week_loc = trim(toString(byName('week_loc'))),
		evac_cost_pool = toDouble(byName('evac_cost_pool')),
		evac_cost_alt_pool = toDouble(byName('evac_cost_alt_pool')),
		break_even_price_pool = toDouble(byName('break_even_price_pool')),
		break_even_price_alt_pool = toDouble(byName('break_even_price_alt_pool')),
		action = trim(toString(byName('action'))),
		standard_comment = trim(toString(byName('standard_comment'))),
		case_id = trim(toString(byName('case_id'))),
		work_order_number = trim(toString(byName('work_order_number'))),
		disposed_date_confirmed_by_the_customer = toTimestamp(byName('disposed_date_confirmed_by_the_customer')),
		country_of_port_entry = trim(toString(byName('country_of_port_entry'))),
		Dispatcher_APM_ID = trim(toString(byName('Dispatcher_APM_ID'))),
		expected_container_sales_location_id = trim(toString(byName('expected_container_sales_location_id'))),
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time = toTimestamp(byName('last_mother_vessel_arrival_time')),
		estimated_status_of_delivery = trim(toString(byName('estimated_status_of_delivery'))),
		move = trim(toString(byName('move'))),
		move_timestamp = toTimestamp(byName('move_timestamp')),
		move_location_id = trim(toString(byName('move_location_id')))) ~> DataTransformation
DataTransformation, sitedatafromblob lookup(dipla_location_id == maersk_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDiplaLocationId
LookupDiplaLocationId select(mapColumn(
		container_id,
		allocation_date,
		dipla_location_name,
		booking_number,
		drop_number,
		destination_location_id,
		destination_location_name,
		consignee_name,
		region,
		last_rail_dest,
		return_client_name,
		return_client_address,
		return_client_email,
		production_year,
		equipment_group,
		consignee_scv_code,
		type,
		week_loc,
		evac_cost_pool,
		evac_cost_alt_pool,
		break_even_price_pool,
		break_even_price_alt_pool,
		action,
		standard_comment,
		case_id,
		work_order_number,
		disposed_date_confirmed_by_the_customer,
		country_of_port_entry,
		Dispatcher_APM_ID,
		expected_container_sales_location_id,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time,
		estimated_status_of_delivery,
		move,
		move_timestamp,
		move_location_id,
		dipla_location_id = maersk_siteid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDiplaLocation
SelectDiplaLocation, sitedatafromblob lookup(last_rail_dest == maersk_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupLastRailDestination
LookupLastRailDestination select(mapColumn(
		container_id,
		allocation_date,
		dipla_location_name,
		booking_number,
		drop_number,
		destination_location_id,
		destination_location_name,
		consignee_name,
		region,
		return_client_name,
		return_client_address,
		return_client_email,
		production_year,
		equipment_group,
		consignee_scv_code,
		type,
		week_loc,
		evac_cost_pool,
		evac_cost_alt_pool,
		break_even_price_pool,
		break_even_price_alt_pool,
		action,
		standard_comment,
		case_id,
		work_order_number,
		disposed_date_confirmed_by_the_customer,
		country_of_port_entry,
		Dispatcher_APM_ID,
		expected_container_sales_location_id,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time,
		estimated_status_of_delivery,
		move,
		move_timestamp,
		move_location_id,
		dipla_location_id,
		last_rail_dest = maersk_siteid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLastRailDestination
SelectLastRailDestination, sitedatafromblob lookup(move_location_id == maersk_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupMoveLocationId
LookupMoveLocationId select(mapColumn(
		container_id,
		allocation_date,
		dipla_location_name,
		booking_number,
		drop_number,
		destination_location_id,
		destination_location_name,
		consignee_name,
		region,
		return_client_name,
		return_client_address,
		return_client_email,
		production_year,
		equipment_group,
		consignee_scv_code,
		type,
		week_loc,
		evac_cost_pool,
		evac_cost_alt_pool,
		break_even_price_pool,
		break_even_price_alt_pool,
		action,
		standard_comment,
		case_id,
		work_order_number,
		disposed_date_confirmed_by_the_customer,
		country_of_port_entry,
		Dispatcher_APM_ID,
		expected_container_sales_location_id,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time,
		estimated_status_of_delivery,
		move,
		move_timestamp,
		dipla_location_id,
		last_rail_dest,
		move_location_id = maersk_siteid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMoveLocationId
SelectMoveLocationId, countrydatafromblob lookup(country_of_port_entry == maersk_countrycode,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountryOfPortEntry
LookupCountryOfPortEntry select(mapColumn(
		container_id,
		allocation_date,
		dipla_location_name,
		booking_number,
		drop_number,
		destination_location_id,
		destination_location_name,
		consignee_name,
		region,
		return_client_name,
		return_client_address,
		return_client_email,
		production_year,
		equipment_group,
		consignee_scv_code,
		type,
		week_loc,
		evac_cost_pool,
		evac_cost_alt_pool,
		break_even_price_pool,
		break_even_price_alt_pool,
		action,
		standard_comment,
		case_id,
		work_order_number,
		disposed_date_confirmed_by_the_customer,
		Dispatcher_APM_ID,
		expected_container_sales_location_id,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time,
		estimated_status_of_delivery,
		move,
		move_timestamp,
		dipla_location_id,
		last_rail_dest,
		move_location_id,
		country_of_port_entry = maersk_countryid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCountryOfPortEntry
SelectCountryOfPortEntry derive(checksum = sha1(columns())) ~> checksum
checksum, dataversedata join(checksum == maersk_datahash,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckForNewData
CheckForNewData filter((isNull(maersk_datahash))) ~> FilterOnlyNewRows
FilterOnlyNewRows select(mapColumn(
		container_id,
		allocation_date,
		dipla_location_name,
		booking_number,
		drop_number,
		destination_location_id,
		destination_location_name,
		consignee_name,
		region,
		return_client_name,
		return_client_address,
		return_client_email,
		production_year,
		equipment_group,
		consignee_scv_code,
		type,
		week_loc,
		evac_cost_pool,
		evac_cost_alt_pool,
		break_even_price_pool,
		break_even_price_alt_pool,
		action,
		standard_comment,
		case_id,
		work_order_number,
		disposed_date_confirmed_by_the_customer,
		Dispatcher_APM_ID,
		expected_container_sales_location_id,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time,
		estimated_status_of_delivery,
		move,
		move_timestamp,
		dipla_location_id,
		last_rail_dest,
		move_location_id,
		country_of_port_entry,
		checksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRequiredColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IntermediateBlobIntermodalpotentialcontainerstodeliver

source(output(
		maersk_siteid as string,
		maersk_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['sitecsp/*.parquet']) ~> sitedatafromblob
source(output(
		createdby as string,
		createdbyname as string,
		createdbyyominame as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		createdonbehalfby as string,
		createdonbehalfbyname as string,
		createdonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		importsequencenumber as integer,
		maersk_address as string,
		maersk_allocatedby as string,
		maersk_allocatedbyalgorythm as boolean,
		maersk_allocateddeallocateddate as timestamp,
		maersk_allocationdate as timestamp,
		maersk_alternateselllocation as string,
		maersk_alternateselllocationname as string,
		maersk_alternatesellpool as string,
		maersk_alternatesellpoolname as string,
		maersk_bookingnumber as string,
		maersk_brand as string,
		maersk_breakevenpricealtpool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_breakevenpricepool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_carriername as string,
		maersk_cdsdestination as string,
		maersk_cdsdestinationname as string,
		maersk_clientname as string,
		maersk_consigneename as string,
		maersk_consigneescvcode as string,
		maersk_containertosaleid as string,
		maersk_datahash as string,
		maersk_destinationarrivaldate as timestamp,
		maersk_destinationarrivaltimeexpectedutc as timestamp,
		maersk_destinationlocationname as string,
		maersk_diplalocation as string,
		maersk_diplalocationname as string,
		maersk_dispatchby as string,
		maersk_dispatchdate as timestamp,
		maersk_dropnumber as string,
		maersk_email as string,
		maersk_equipmentgroup as string,
		maersk_equipmentowntype as string,
		maersk_evaccostaltpool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_evacostpool as decimal(38,18),
		maersk_haulagetype as integer,
		maersk_isallocated as boolean,
		maersk_lastmothervesselarrivaltime as timestamp,
		maersk_lastmothervesseldestinationlocation as string,
		maersk_lastmothervesseldestinationlocationname as string,
		maersk_lastraildestination as string,
		maersk_lastraildestinationname as string,
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_nextcarriername as string,
		maersk_nextwonumber as string,
		maersk_pool as string,
		maersk_poolallocatedto as string,
		maersk_poolallocatedtoname as string,
		maersk_poolname as string,
		maersk_primarycompositekey as string,
		maersk_productionyear as string,
		maersk_railcombo as boolean,
		maersk_region as string,
		maersk_regpool as string,
		maersk_regpoolname as string,
		maersk_shipmentid as string,
		maersk_truckcarriername as string,
		maersk_type as string,
		maersk_week as integer,
		maersk_weekloc as string,
		maersk_wonumber as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		modifiedbyname as string,
		modifiedbyyominame as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		modifiedonbehalfby as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyname as string,
		modifiedonbehalfbyyominame as string,
		overriddencreatedon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		owneridname as string,
		owneridtype as string,
		owneridyominame as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		owningteam as string,
		owninguser as string,
		statecode as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as integer,
		utcconversiontimezonecode as integer,
		versionnumber as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['potentialcontainertosell']) ~> Dataversedata
source(output(
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_poolid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['pool/*.parquet']) ~> pooldatafromblob
Dataversedata select(mapColumn(
		container_id = maersk_name,
		drop_number = maersk_dropnumber,
		consignee_scv_code = maersk_consigneescvcode,
		pool_id = maersk_pool,
		reg_pool = maersk_regpool,
		eqpno = maersk_name,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time = maersk_lastmothervesselarrivaltime,
		last_mother_vessel_destination_location_id = maersk_lastmothervesseldestinationlocation,
		destination_arrival_time_utc_expected = maersk_destinationarrivaltimeexpectedutc,
		shipment_id = maersk_shipmentid,
		booking_number = maersk_bookingnumber,
		brand = maersk_brand,
		equipment_group = maersk_equipmentgroup,
		production_year = maersk_productionyear,
		equipment_own_type = maersk_equipmentowntype,
		destination_arrival_date = maersk_destinationarrivaldate,
		dipla_location_id = maersk_diplalocation,
		dipla_location_name = maersk_diplalocationname,
		destination_location_name = maersk_destinationlocationname,
		consignee_name = maersk_consigneename,
		last_rail_dest = maersk_lastraildestination,
		CARRIER_NAME = maersk_carriername,
		NEXT_WONUMBER = maersk_nextwonumber,
		NEXT_CARRIER_NAME = maersk_nextcarriername,
		WONUMBER = maersk_wonumber,
		rail_combo = maersk_railcombo,
		wo_number = maersk_wonumber,
		truck_carrier_name = maersk_truckcarriername,
		cds_dest = maersk_cdsdestination,
		region = maersk_region,
		alternate_sell_location = maersk_alternateselllocation,
		alternate_sell_pool = maersk_alternatesellpool,
		break_even_price_pool = maersk_breakevenpricepool,
		break_even_price_alt_pool = maersk_breakevenpricealtpool,
		week = maersk_week,
		haulage_type = maersk_haulagetype,
		pool_allocated_to = maersk_poolallocatedto,
		allocation_date = maersk_allocationdate,
		allocated_by = maersk_allocatedby,
		allocated_by_algorithm = maersk_allocatedbyalgorythm,
		dispatch_date = maersk_dispatchdate,
		dispatch_by = maersk_dispatchby,
		week_loc = maersk_weekloc,
		is_allocated = maersk_isallocated,
		client_name = maersk_clientname,
		address = maersk_address,
		email = maersk_email,
		type = maersk_type,
		evac_cost_pool = maersk_evacostpool,
		evac_cost_alt_pool = maersk_evaccostaltpool,
		primary_composite_key = maersk_primarycompositekey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
Selectdiplalocationid, sitedatafromblob lookup(last_rail_dest == maersk_siteid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupLastRailDestination
LookupLastRailDestination select(mapColumn(
		container_id,
		drop_number,
		consignee_scv_code,
		pool_id,
		reg_pool,
		eqpno,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time,
		last_mother_vessel_destination_location_id,
		destination_arrival_time_utc_expected,
		shipment_id,
		booking_number,
		brand,
		equipment_group,
		production_year,
		equipment_own_type,
		destination_arrival_date,
		dipla_location_id,
		dipla_location_name,
		destination_location_name,
		consignee_name,
		last_rail_dest = maersk_name,
		CARRIER_NAME,
		NEXT_WONUMBER,
		NEXT_CARRIER_NAME,
		WONUMBER,
		rail_combo,
		wo_number,
		truck_carrier_name,
		cds_dest,
		region,
		alternate_sell_location,
		alternate_sell_pool,
		break_even_price_pool,
		break_even_price_alt_pool,
		week,
		haulage_type,
		pool_allocated_to,
		allocation_date,
		allocated_by,
		allocated_by_algorithm,
		dispatch_date,
		dispatch_by,
		week_loc,
		is_allocated,
		client_name,
		address,
		email,
		type,
		evac_cost_pool,
		evac_cost_alt_pool,
		primary_composite_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLastRailDestination
SelectLastRailDestination, sitedatafromblob lookup(cds_dest == maersk_siteid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCDSDestination
LookupCDSDestination select(mapColumn(
		container_id,
		drop_number,
		consignee_scv_code,
		pool_id,
		reg_pool,
		eqpno,
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time,
		last_mother_vessel_destination_location_id,

StagingBlobPotentialContainerToSell derive(consignee_scv_code = trim(toString(byName('consignee_scv_code'))),
		pool_id = trim(toString(byName('pool_id'))),
		reg_pool = trim(toString(byName('reg_pool'))),
		eqpno = trim(toString(byName('eqpno'))),
		container_id = trim(toString(byName('container_id'))),
		last_mother_vessel_arrival_time = toTimestamp(byName('last_mother_vessel_arrival_time')),
		last_mother_vessel_destination_location_id = trim(toString(byName('last_mother_vessel_destination_location_id'))),
		place_of_delivery_location_id = trim(toString(byName('place_of_delivery_location_id'))),
		destination_arrival_time_utc_expected = toTimestamp(byName('destination_arrival_time_utc_expected')),
		shipment_id = trim(toString(byName('shipment_id'))),
		booking_number = trim(toString(byName('booking_number'))),
		brand = trim(toString(byName('brand'))),
		equipment_group = trim(toString(byName('equipment_group'))),
		production_year = trim(toString(byName('production_year'))),
		equipment_own_type = trim(toString(byName('equipment_own_type'))),
		destination_arrival_date = toTimestamp(byName('destination_arrival_date')),
		dipla_location_id = trim(toString(byName('dipla_location_id'))),
		dipla_location_name = trim(toString(byName('dipla_location_name'))),
		destination_location_name = trim(toString(byName('destination_location_name'))),
		consignee_name = trim(toString(byName('consignee_name'))),
		last_rail_dest = trim(toString(byName('last_rail_dest'))),
		CARRIER_NAME = trim(toString(byName('CARRIER_NAME'))),
		NEXT_WONUMBER = trim(toString(byName('NEXT_WONUMBER'))),
		NEXT_CARRIER_NAME = trim(toString(byName('NEXT_CARRIER_NAME'))),
		WONUMBER = trim(toString(byName('WONUMBER'))),
		rail_combo = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('rail_combo'))))=='TRUE',"1","0")),
		wo_number = trim(toString(byName('wo_number'))),
		truck_carrier_name = trim(toString(byName('truck_carrier_name'))),
		cds_dest = trim(toString(byName('cds_dest'))),
		region = trim(toString(byName('region'))),
		alternate_sell_location = trim(toString(byName('alternate_sell_location'))),
		alternate_sell_pool = trim(toString(byName('alternate_sell_pool')))) ~> DataTransformation
